product_description: An adrenaline-filled motorsports complex in Mirabel offering supercar driving experiences, karting, flight simulation via Aerodium, and defensive driving courses.
key_features: Professional race tracks (located at former Mirabel airport)
Accessibility to beginners and pros alike
target_audience: Adrenaline seekers, car enthusiasts, corporate groups, and families looking for unique thrill experiences.

primary_personas.name: The Thrill Seeker
primary_personas.description: Wants to feel the power of a Ferrari or Lamborghini on a real track.

primary_personas.name: The Corporate Planner
primary_personas.description: Looking for a high-energy team building event that impresses clients/staff.

primary_personas.name: The Karting Fan
primary_personas.description: Competitive spirit looking for the best karting track in the region.

primary_personas.name: Gift Buyer
primary_personas.description: Looking for the ultimate gift experience for a spouse or parent who loves cars.

buying_behaviors: High impulse buy for gifts (Christmas, Father's Day)
communication_style: High-energy, direct, focused on the sensory experience (speed, sound, power). Uses exclamation points and action verbs.
unique_selling_proposition: The ultimate motorsports playground in Quebec where you can drive your dream car on a professional track.
differentiation_elements: Largest fleet of supercars available for public driving
social_proof: Thousands of 5-star reviews on TripAdvisor/Google. Host of NASCAR Canada events.
mission_statement: To provide safe, accessible, and unforgettable motorsports experiences for everyone.
